name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
My friends are all sharing the "Ten Questions" about the epidemic. There is nothing much to say. They are all topics that have been talked about on Twitter for a long time. I don't even want to post pictures of the content.
I think these problems should have been understood by everyone a long time ago, but epidemic prevention is a political account and has nothing to do with the epidemic.
I think what everyone should really ask is themselves. Everyone acquiesced and condoned the unreasonableness faced by others, so this unreasonableness eventually fell on themselves.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
It was so magical. At 12 o'clock in the middle of the night, I watched a short video live broadcast for the first time in my life, and witnessed the struggle of Foxconn workers in the live broadcast... While shouting slogans for rights protection, I thanked the boss (netizen) for the gift. In my lifetime, I never thought that these two things could overlap everything.
Magic, so magical

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Foxconn workers' live broadcast of the protest
During the video, the host said several times that the police were ready to come in, and some workers threw stones and guardrails in response
The live broadcast was then interrupted due to violations

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The keyboard sound in the video is the sound of me editing the last tweet. I forgot to turn off the microphone when I was recording Weibo yesterday. Sorry.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Maybe some friends misunderstood what I meant.
I didn't laugh at such behavior. I just lamented that these two things could be integrated together. The pursuit of personal rights overlapped with the simple and original live broadcast on the Internet, creating a unique cyber and punk here.
Good morning, Night City!

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Foxconn announced the solution: 
1,600 yuan subsidy during quarantine
Employees willing to stay
30 yuan per hour, calculated as eight hours per day during quarantine. 3,000 yuan for 30 days of work, and another 3,000 yuan for 60 days.
Employees willing to return home
Hourly wages are the same as above, unified arrangements within the province, reimbursement of travel expenses outside the province, quarantine subsidies, and return home work expenses

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: I simply calculated based on the Foxconn work schedule on the Internet. Eight hours a day, two hours of overtime at 1.5 times the salary, 20 hours of overtime on weekends, 330 a day, 1650 five days a week, 600 on weekends, a total of 2250, 9000 a month, plus a full attendance bonus of 3000, a worker can get 12,000 a month, including the previous quarantine subsidy, 13,600.

content: @linzhutou404 I don't care about foreign affairs, so I don't know what happened to the news about Russia bombing Poland. However, I think in the Internet age, a piece of news can be proved from many aspects. Maybe a video looks like it happened in Hengdian, but dozens of videos together, and thousands of people live broadcasting it, can completely prove that this incident really happened in Zhengzhou. This is a very simple truth.

content: About ten minutes ago, Foxconn employees gathered again near Huahong Apartment.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The Henan labor platform Fujibangren WeChat account released the contents of the emergency meeting of the provincial command center. The general contents are as follows:
Yesterday's incident was mainly caused by people from other provinces. Now it has been decided not to recruit people from other provinces.
The treatment remains the same, and 6,000 volunteers have been selected to further improve the factory service
We hope that the Henan people in the park will maintain the image of Zhengzhou people and Henan people

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: @qiyan55624748 Taiwanese factories are no longer controllable when it comes to foreign forces. Patriotic fellow villagers think that they can just demolish the factories to bring glory to the country.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
It is worth noting that the content targeting Foxconn did not seem to be blocked on a large scale in China this time. Although some netizens said that thousands of live broadcast accounts were blocked from yesterday to today, you can still see discussions on related topics on Weibo, and even a large number of videos can be seen on short video platforms without being blocked.
This is a very rare phenomenon in recent years.
This picture is a screenshot I took two minutes ago

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: There have been people live-streaming the incident for nearly 24 hours from yesterday to today, and videos have been continuously leaked. In fact, if you want to take any action, you can just block the keywords. But now you can still get all kinds of information about Foxconn by searching for keywords, and many videos remain on the Internet. This is completely different from the way some previous mass incidents were handled.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:

The video shows that the relevant parties have proposed a new solution for Henan people: 10,000 yuan per person, free quarantine within the province, gathering downstairs at 7 o'clock, Henan people sign, take the money and leave.

A factory submitted an article to refute the rumor. The 10,000 agreed upon in the afternoon has now become 3,000. The people of Henan and Shaanxi are carrying red flags and preparing to continue the charge.

The video also shows that everyone was in an orderly manner when queuing to receive the money. Everything was fine at first, but then the amount of money was wrong, and they started to make trouble in the factory area. Now there are people in the factory area and on the main road outside the dormitory. I guess they will call the special police again.

Before press time, the condition had been released in the form of news.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: A netizen submitted a post saying that a situation also occurred in Haizhu District, Guangzhou today. Currently, the keyword "Haizhu District" on Twitter is being flooded with posts by trolls. The specific reason is unknown.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The latest news is that Foxconn has set off a second wave tonight.
An employee submitted a post saying that at around 9:48, about 20 minutes after the solution was announced, the worker who scanned the resignation code found that the health code was red.
Someone in the video also said that the card was frozen after the money was received. The workers gathered in units of provinces and prepared to go to the city government.
A conflict occurred again in the video. The post said that the white man who was beaten was a Foxconn security guard, not a policeman. The identity of the person who beat up the employee is unclear.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Based on a private interview with an employee who continued to contribute tonight, I will now give a general introduction to the current situation at Foxconn.
The park is very large, and multiple locations have broken out at the same time. The workers' demands are not consistent. Some are because of the contract and some are because of the epidemic.
The person who made the most noise took 20,000 yuan and left (it should be the red code mentioned in the video after getting the money).
The rest of the people in the park where the contributor is located also decided to take 10,000 yuan and leave.
The complete interview will be sorted out and sent out
